channel.title: Faces in dialogue?
channel.description: I really want it so when i have the dialogue with the npc the npcs face is there. Check icepk.com, that server has it. For almost every npc you talk to their face is in the dialogue. Please tell me how.

item.title: Faces in dialogue?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

This is what it looks like

else if (NPCID == 945) { //Runescape_Guide messageFromNpc("Testing", "Testing", 945); }
No compiling errors, but i click on npc and it doesnt pop up.

Read full topic

item.title: Faces in dialogue?
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Ok here. Add this method anywhere in client.java:

public void messageFromNpc(String message, String title, int npcid){
				sendFrame200(4883, 591);
				sendFrame126(title, 4884);
				sendFrame126(message, 4885);
				sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886);
				sendFrame75(npcid, 4883);
				sendFrame164(4882);
				NpcDialogueSend = true;
}

Then use:

messageFromNpc("message", "npc name / title", npcid);

The npc id being the id of the npc whos head you want to appear.

Read full topic
